downloaded it today, and when i tried to instal it the instal wizard did pop up but says game folder not found so i hit ok and the wizard continues with instal but after i accept terms it sayd it can't find a folder to install it in so when i just pick one it says that it cannot find pharaoh.exe in a folder so does this mean that i need to first dl pharaoh first or what ?

pod3210: hi u have to make a seperate directory for Pharaoh - example suggestion: c:\games\pharaoh - but put it wherever you want, i suggest you name it "pharaoh" though. u can just unrar the files in that directory, and after that, u can just run the "regsetup.exe" prog. this should conclude the installation, now you can run the game with pharaoh.exe - and make a shortcut in your games start menu folder. if you have any problems after this, i cant help you, and have no responsibility for these problems, sorry....

But where are the sounds??? The wav folder is EMPTY. :( Under the audio folder, there's ambient, music and voice, which are all ok... but the wav folder is empty! I remembre a lot more sounds way back when i first played it... :( (like the temple gongs, crowd cheers etc.)

^ ^ yeah you're probably correct there. the reason is simple - this package contains a ripped original pharaoh, and a full cleopatra expansion (after it has been installed). i was not sure what, if anything, was missing from the original version. now we've cleared that up it seems. i cant help w/the missing sounds tho, sorry.

ps. since the game worked very easily by just installing the folder wherever u want, i thought this package was much easier and cooler than another posted torrent - actually, 2 other torrents - with pharaoh and cleopatra posted as separate full ISO's  that made the full download MUCH bigger.

"sorry" if u're offended by my attempt to help/do something cool. (of course, noT ;)
on that note, have a merry xmas and a happy new pirate yARR , lmao !

Here's my quick guide to complete installation for this awesome game from this awesome pack:

1. Extract in ANY directory - this will be your game directory.
2. Run setup.bat - this will unpack sounds in appropriate place.
3. Run setupreg.exe - not sure what exactly it does, probably writing keys to registry of something.
